# <a name="how-to-view-outlookcom-message-headers-or-message-source"></a><span data-ttu-id="a48fd-102">Zobrazenie hlavičiek správ Outlook.com alebo zdroja správy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a48fd-102">How to view Outlook.com message headers or message source</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a48fd-103">Ak chcete zobraziť hlavičky a ďalšie podrobnosti v e-maile, vyberte tri bodky</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a48fd-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="a48fd-104">v hornom rohu tably na čítanie a vyberte položku **Zobraziť zdroj správ**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a48fd-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
